title: Google Maps Business Scraper Input
description: Configuration for scraping Google Maps businesses

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: List of Google Maps search queries (e.g., 'plumbers in New York')

maxResultsPerQuery.title: Max Results Per Query
maxResultsPerQuery.description: Maximum number of businesses to extract per search query

filterNoWebsite.title: Filter: No Website Only
filterNoWebsite.description: Only return businesses without a website (perfect for landing pages)

minRating.title: Minimum Rating
minRating.description: Only return businesses with at least this rating (0-5)

minReviewCount.title: Minimum Review Count
minReviewCount.description: Only return businesses with at least this many reviews
